title: In what contexts can you use the word ‘roadmap’? - Quora

response.answer_text: In a motorcar or other vehicle, a roadmap is a useful document to have, in case your satnav misdirects you. In another sense, usually political, a roadmap provides a suggested pathway/journey/route towards solving a particular problem.

Apart from the obvious connotations with maps giving directions, “roadmap” has been subsumed by politicians to describe what future actions should be deemed necessary to wind down precautions against the recent pandemic, Covid 19.
